snippet: President Obama heads to Martha’s Vineyard on Saturday, stealing a week’s vacation before dealing with looming deadlines for the budget, among other pressing issues.
abstract: Pres Obama heads off to Martha's Vineyard for his family's almost annual August vacation, stealing a week's break before dealing with looming deadlines for the budget, his health care law and the appointment of a new Federal Reserve chairman.
lead_paragraph: President Obama heads to Martha’s Vineyard on Saturday, stealing a week’s vacation before dealing with looming deadlines for the budget, among other pressing issues.

headline.main: Amid Domestic Deadlines and Global Crises, Obama Begins a Shorter Break
headline.print_headline: Amid Domestic Deadlines and Global Crises, Obama Begins a Shorter Break
